Jeff... please a quick look. See if this is severe enough to hold up M2.
Is this a regression? Or has it always been there? thx...

I can't reproduce this in the development environment or in a clean install of
Eclipse and the latest build of VE.  Perhaps clean out the configuration in your
eclipse environment using the -clean launching action?

Please reopen if the problem persists.
Since this bug was not reOpened for more than a month, this bug is verified.
